content: woven stitch dishcloth materials & supplies 1 ball cream n sugar - cornflower blue size g crochet hook directions row 1 chain 30 single_crochet in second chain from hook *chain 1 skip next chain single_crochet in next chain repeat from * across chain 1 turn row 2 skip first single_crochet *single_crochet in chain 1 space chain 1 skip next single_crochet repeat from * ending in 1 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 3 single_crochet in first single_crochet *chain 1 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in chain 1 space repeat from * ending in 1 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 4-30 repeat row 3 working in ends of row in free loops of foundation chain ends of row on opposite side and in row 30 single_crochet evenly around working 3 single_crochet in corners join to beg with slip_stitch finish off weave in ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l halvorson
